rows.label: bf06420100_0010
rows.name: Meleph-sama, you're making that face again.

rows.label: bf06420100_0020
rows.name:
If you keep frowning like that,
you'll get wrinkles.

rows.label: bf06420100_0030
rows.name: ...I just don't get it.

rows.label: bf06420100_0040
rows.name: The anti-Adel faction founded Luxuria...

rows.label: bf06420100_0050
rows.name:
After the war, they completely
avoided interference from other countries.

rows.label: bf06420100_0060
rows.name:
But...the way the king was acting...
I can't help feeling there's something more to it.

rows.label: bf06420100_0070
rows.name: What, though?

rows.label: bf06420100_0080
rows.name: It was the Holy See who sent us here on this mission.

rows.label: bf06420100_0090
rows.name: Why would he go to such lengths to reject it...?

rows.label: bf06420100_0100
rows.name:
It seemed almost like he wanted to
cut ties with them...

rows.label: bf06420100_0110
rows.name:
Does it mean that
they were being held by some other weakness?.

rows.label: bf06420100_0120
rows.name:
That would explain it.
Zeke, what about the circumstances around that?

rows.label: bf06420100_0130
rows.name: Don't know, there are no records left.

rows.label: bf06420100_0140
rows.name: How about you?

rows.label: bf06420100_0150
rows.name: There's nothing in my diary from that time.

rows.label: bf06420100_0160
rows.name:
I might have been returned to my core
for some reason or other.

rows.label: bf06420100_0170
rows.name: Do you know anything about those days, Gramps?

rows.label: bf06420100_0180
rows.name:
Mmm...?
Noo, I was somewhere else at the time.

rows.label: bf06420100_0190
rows.name:
And matters of human kingdoms and so on
didn't interest me much.

rows.label: bf06420100_0200
rows.name:
Geez Gramps, what's the point of keeping an old-timer
like you around if you don't even know anything?!

rows.label: bf06420100_0210
rows.name: Sometimes, it's funny how much you sound like Correl.

rows.label: bf06420100_0220
rows.name: So you think the king wasn't telling us everything?

rows.label: bf06420100_0230
rows.name: There is a chance.

rows.label: bf06420100_0240
rows.name:
Do you think it may be related to Shin
and his comrades using Iira's name?

rows.label: bf06430100_0010
rows.name:
"If you saw the last state of humanity, you'd
understand. Now that you have come this far..."
